author: Sami Laine <laine.j.sami@gmail.com>
description: Toggles proxy settings between "Manual" and whatever was defined in network settings previously.
name: sjl-proxy-toggler

preferences.name: proxyStateNotPressed
preferences.title: Default Proxy State
preferences.description: The proxy setting to be used when 'Toggle Proxy'-button is not checked ie. when it has not been pressed.

options.name: autoDetect
options.label: Auto-detect proxy settings for this network

preferences.name: proxyStatePressed
preferences.title: Proxy State when the button is pressed
preferences.description: The proxy setting to be used when 'Toggle Proxy'-button is checked ie. when it has been pressed.

options.name: autoDetect
options.label: Auto-detect proxy settings for this network

title: SJL's Proxy Toggler
